sales_1.title: Lead Generation Pipeline
sales_1.description: Build and maintain a consistent lead generation system through strategic content marketing and engagement
weekly_actions: Create valuable content based on client insights and industry trends
Analyze content performance and optimize strategy
Engage with prospects through multiple channels
daily_actions: Share valuable content on social platforms
Respond to engagement and nurture prospects
Update CRM with new lead information and insights
sales_1.notes: Focus on providing value first, building trust and authority

sales_2.title: Client Acquisition
sales_2.description: Close 3 new agency clients at $5k+/month retainer by March 31, 2025
weekly_actions: Identify 5 new prospects via LinkedIn/referrals
Send personalized outreach to 5 prospects
Follow up with previous week's prospects
Conduct 2 discovery calls with interested prospects
Send proposals to qualified prospects

delivery_1.title: Service Standardization
delivery_1.description: Create standardized delivery process for 80% of common client requests by Feb 28, 2025
weekly_actions: Document one delivery process (2 hours)
Test documented process with current client
Refine process based on testing feedback
daily_actions: Review all client communications for response time
Run through quality checklist before delivery
Send satisfaction survey within 48 hours after delivery

delivery_2.title: Quality Assurance
delivery_2.description: Achieve 95% client satisfaction score by March 31, 2025
daily_actions: Review all client communications for response time
Run through quality checklist before delivery
Send satisfaction survey within 48 hours after delivery

product_1.title: OpsBrain Enhancement
product_1.description: Complete 8 high-impact features from TODO.md by March 31, 2025
weekly_actions: Development and testing
Deployment and documentation
Client feedback collection and iteration planning
product_1.notes: Focus on bi-directional Slack-Notion sync and smart task parsing

financial_1.title: Revenue Optimization
financial_1.description: Increase profit margin to 70% by optimizing processes and pricing by March 31, 2025
weekly_actions: Review previous week's time allocation
Update pricing for new proposals based on efficiency gains
Calculate weekly revenue and expenses

team_1.title: Strategic Hiring Plan
team_1.description: Hire first contractor (VA or junior developer) by Feb 28, 2025
weekly_actions: Define role requirements and compensation
Post job and screen initial candidates
Interview top 5 candidates
Make offer and begin onboarding
team_1.notes: Virtual assistant for content creation and lead research

process_1.title: CEO Dashboard
process_1.description: Create automated weekly CEO dashboard by Feb 15, 2025
weekly_actions: Review dashboard and identify trends
Make strategic adjustments based on data
Plan next week based on dashboard insights
